name: Budgets; financial records on fiscal year basis
text:
PART III.  FISCAL ADMINISTRATION
 
         Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, all counties shall maintain accounting and financial records on a fiscal year basis, beginning on July 1 or another day of a calendar year and ending on the appropriate day of the next succeeding calendar year.  Counties may prepare a budget for a one- or two-year period; provided that accounting and financial records are maintained on a fiscal year basis as described above. [L 1965, c 166, §1; Supp, §138-6.5; HRS §46-41; am L 1993, c 169, §1; am L 2006, c 119, §1]
 
Note
 
  The 2006 amendment applies to fiscal years beginning after December 31, 2005.  L 2006, c 119, §3.
